sentences.en: A small dram of whisky may be prescribed by doctors for those over 60 to help them sleep. It is vital though to emphasize that "small" is the operative word.
sentences.cn: 医生可以建议60岁以上的老人少量地喝点威士忌以改善睡眠，然而至关重要的是必须强调“少量”这个关键词。

sentences.en: A variety of materials are in widespread use in DRAM.
sentences.cn: 几种不同材料已经在DRAM里广泛使用了.

sentences.en: Anti - fuse is widely used in FPGA, DRAM, PROM, EPROM chips.
sentences.cn: 反熔丝器件 广泛地应用在FPGA 、 DRAM 、 PROM 、 EPROM芯片中.

sentences.en: DRAM is used to temporarily store data in personal computers and electronic gadgets.
sentences.cn: DRAM被用在个人电脑和电子产品上来临时存储数据.

sentences.en: He is fond of a dram.
I went and fetched a good dram of rum, and gave him.
sentences.cn: 我拿了一大杯甘蔗酒, 让他喝下去.

sentences.en: RAM comes in many varieties, including dynamic RAM ( DRAM ), synchronous RAM and synchronous dynamic RAM ( SDRAM ).
sentences.cn: RAM有多种形式, 包括动态RAM ( DRAM ) 、 同步RAM和同步动态RAM ( SDRAM ).

sentences.en: The DRAM manufacturers almost have no profit margins to speak of.
sentences.cn: 生产电脑存储器(dram)的厂家几乎无钱可赚.

sentences.en: The DRAM manufacturers almost have no profit margins to speak of. Many of them suffered losses.
sentences.cn: 生产电脑存储器(DRAM) 的厂家几乎无钱可赚, 很多还赔本.

sentences.en: The DRAM Pricing hand - sheng sought to provide the best available current enforcement strategy.
sentences.cn: 汇盛力图向操盘手提供时下可以获得的最佳的执行策略.

sentences.en: Then, GOI test methodology is extended to reliability evaluation of DRAM capacitor.
sentences.cn: 同时, 我们将GOI的 测试方法进一步推广,用于动态存储器电容可靠性评估.

sentences.en: Total DRAM sales fell 8 percent even as unIt'shipments increased by 7 percent.
sentences.cn: DRAM的单位出货量增加了7%,但是总的销售额却下降了8%.

sentences.en: What I dram of is to be a broadcaster on TV.
sentences.cn: 我的梦想是成为一名电视播音员.

sentences.en: When DRAM demand was strong, so many DRAM factories were set up, especially in East Asia.
sentences.cn: 当DRAM晶片市场需求强劲的时候, 许多工厂纷纷上马, 在东亚更是如此.

sentences.en: Would you care for a dram?

trans.tran_en: a small alcoholic drink, especially  whisky  – used especially in Scotland
